Welcome to E-Toll Management

Our system allows you to manage your toll payments electronically. Register now and enjoy a hassle-free driving experience.

How It Works

  1. Register your vehicle and create an account.
  2. Load balance into your account using secure payment methods.
  3. As you pass through toll gates, your vehicle will be automatically identified and the toll will be deducted from your account.

Benefits

  • Faster and more convenient toll payment
  • Reduced traffic congestion at toll plazas
  • Secure and reliable system
  • Detailed transaction history and account management
